message.body: No I talked to her and told her you were doing the design work and it's all your ownership
She is just enthusiastic and an overachiever
I told her if she wants to send you stuff fine, but you own all the design work if you choose to use it and you will be given 100% credit for the Entire design work
So I told her she really shouldn't- if she wants to send you logo brainstorms I said fine but it will be your logo and you're not sharing any credit. She understood
She might still send you stuff but it's just bc she wants you to like her. She is just trying to be helpful
If you met her you'd see she is very not aggressive actually
She is more an over-doer and eager to please
Also Alec feels weird about strangers using his photo so it won't happen I'm sorry! He is shy in some ways
Understandable! Re Alec! And I really like her. She seems great. I didn't mean it in a negative way.
HEY HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!
Yayayayay!!!! Happy bday to meeeeee
Oh I just saw that email. I wasn't going to bring a gift but now I'm glad you mentioned it
I didn't bring a gift to Ishmael's bday and I was the only one who didn't and it was so embarrassing
But I hate gifts and especially when I'm hosting events so I just assume people are like me
Since I'm driving, maybe I could bring the gift? From both of us? Maybe some Philly or penn related I
i just had a major realization

that when that guy kissed me last weekend. it was actually really bad. Like i had left the party to go home and he chased after me. Like RAN after me and was like let me walk you home and I was like no. Any respectful non-drunk person would have been like, ok let me get you a cab! BUT NO its ok bc your super drunk and I’m super drunk for me to disregard what you say and follow you, at full pace, down the street. This world is completely sexist.
Hmm wait I dunno
I think you have to explain to me what happened exactly
Bc that sounds like he was just worried? You thought he was being pushy?
Did this happen before or after he kissed you?

Ok. We were all at a party. and we were kinda cuddling on the couch - that part is hazy - not just me and this kid, but like a group of four us piled drunkenly onto the couch. And kyle was like touching the small of my back... you know like very flirty. like something that i would have never let happen if i wasn’t drunk. bc i was so loaded i could just pretend it wasn’t happening. And then i was like it’s time to go. I got up and all of us started leaving. I got out of the building first, and said goodbye. and then I’m half way down the block and kyle yelled. wait. I’m coming with you.
and then he was like i am going to walk you home.
and i said thats weird. you live in the opposite direction. and he said, “ but I want to spend time with you” and I said how about I walk you in the direction of your home.
Oh and Then you kissed?
and we started walking. I mean this is all really hazy.
As in, you feel like he was pushy
and then he was like standing over me and kissed me’
and then i said, oh wait we are friends
and he said, I’ve wanted to do that for so long
he said, you know i’ve wanted to do that
and then i was like, if you want to be my friend help me get a cab (i was too drunk to use my uber app)
i was really durnk
like i couldn’t figure out how to get home
and then he kissed me again
and i was like, omg you have a gf wtf
and he was like you have a bf
and i was like oh theres a cab
good bye
ahhaha
wow
thanks for letting me write this out
Ooooh man he has a gf too!?
Oh that is bad
i think he was really pushy
He sounds dangerous
i think i had excused myself from a situation before anything bad happened
OH YEAH HES TOTALLY NOT TEMPTING AT ALL
like i would never want to sleep with him
but now i just don’t think we can be friends
sad
bc he’s about to write an architecture thesis!
POSSIBLE CLIENT
Mention us to him!
Haha
No seriously. I'm so excited
Sorry I had to get off the phone so suddenly btw- one of the puppies wriggled out of her harness right by a major busy road yikes!
She is fine though- I lunged at her haha
My wireless just went down but I'm home now and waiting for it to restart so I can send the files
I didn't realize that dude had a gf
He sounds like a narcissist and in it for ego strokes or down thing
*something
Or enjoys the thrill of doing something bad? His poor gf though
yeah they live together
she’s also older
i don’t know what the deal it
Your age?
i have no clue
i didn’t know he lived with her
i iddn’t know he had one until a few months ago
and I’ve been his friend for like 3 yrs
Haha what a mensch
i am not teaching today
but I’m a little annoyed bc my boss at emmanuel wants me to be his point person while he’s on sabbatical
and its like dude
no
i will teach the two classes
but i will not fend off questions from other adjuncts as a favor to you
but i don’t know how to say no
Happy birthday
Say you don't foresee having time
I think that is a polite way of saying no and also subtly reminding him that you already carry a huge work load
￼Happy Birthady1
